content: in this legal case the tartu district court made a final decision after almost two years the case involved a claimant and a defendant who wanted to divide their joint assets the claimant requested a disposal ban to prevent the defendant from reducing the value of the assets or transferring shares without consent the court granted the claimants request and ordered the seizure of parts of the companies the defendant appealed arguing that the claimant provided incorrect information about the sale of one of the companies however the district court upheld the county courts decision to secure the claim and dismissed the appeal the parties have the right to appeal further if they wish
